amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting or limiting the issuance of costly Clean Air Act permit requirements on farmers and ranchers in the United States or the imposition of new Federal methane requirements on livestock.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3115 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 33. Record Vote Number: 333.

action.text: Amendment SA 3115 proposed by Senator Ernst. (consideration: CR S6220-6221; text: CR S6220) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting or limiting the issuance of costly Clean Air Act permit requirements on farmers and ranchers in the United States or the imposition of new Federal methane requirements on livestock.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3115 proposed by Senator Ernst.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3115 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 33. Record Vote Number: 333.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3115 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 33. Record Vote Number: 333.
